title: Household items 2
sentences: My bed is very big and comfortable.
I need a harder pillow to sleep well.
I put clean sheets in your room.
I'm cold; can you give me another blanket?
The mattress of this bed is new.
Keep your clothes in the closet, please.
Do you have a hanger for my jacket?
Busca los calcetines en el segundo
Look for the socks in the second drawer.
está llena de ropa de verano.
The chest of drawers is full of summer clothes.
Put the books on the shelf.
I always study at my desk.
se ha fundido y no hay luz.
The lightbulb has blown and there is no light.
The socket is behind the table.
Press the switch to turn on the light.
Pass me the remote to change the channel.
I run the vacuum cleaner through the whole house.
Sweep the floor with the broom.
Clean the floor with the mop and water.
Fill the bucket with water and soap.
Use a rag to remove the dust.
I have to iron this white shirt.
Pon la ropa sucia en la
Put the dirty clothes in the washing machine.
The dryer makes a lot of noise.
Hang the coats on the coat racks at the entrance.
I can't find my keys anywhere.
I have to prepare the suitcase for the trip.
Take the umbrella because it's going to rain.
Throw the paper into the wastepaper basket.
suena a las siete de la mañana.
The alarm clock rings at seven in the morning.
The fan helps a lot when it's hot.
Turn on the heating if you're cold.
está roto y hace mucho calor.
The air conditioning is broken and it's very hot.
para tomar un poco de aire.
I go out to the balcony to get some air.
We are having dinner on the terrace because it's a nice night.
Me gusta mucho trabajar en el
I really like working in the garden with my plants.
